nodes.text: Ploughtekal Market was a sprawling, multi-level market in the Zi-Kree Sector on Coruscant. It contained both permanent storefronts and temporary stalls selling virtually anything. The levels of the market were connected by a network of well-hidden access tubes that made escape possible when the authorities put in an appearance.
Ploughtekal was a place of dark shadow and neon gleam, thick smells, and torrential sound. It was Babel, with the languages of a hundred worlds entwined, woven together with Basic. It never slept.
